Installing micro

Development is slow enough that your package manager probably has you covered. But itâ€™s also a single executable file that you can install and run anywhere

curl https://getmic.ro | bash && mv micro ~/.local/bin

Filemanager plugin

 
> plugin install filemanager

Open a file tree in the current directory
